# braintrustdata_org (Data Source)

Reads a Braintrust organization by `id` or by exact `name`.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Read an organization by ID
data "braintrustdata_org" "by_id" {
  id = "org-123"
}

# Read an organization by exact name
data "braintrustdata_org" "by_name" {
  name = "example-org"
}

output "organization_id" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_org.by_name.id
}

output "organization_api_url" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_org.by_name.api_url
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the organization. Specify either `id` or `name`.
- `name` (String) The organization name. Used as an exact-match lookup when `id` is not provided.

### Read-Only

- `api_url` (String) The API URL for organization-scoped endpoints.
- `created` (String) The timestamp when the organization was created.
- `image_rendering_mode` (String) Image rendering behavior in Braintrust UI.
- `is_dataplane_private` (Boolean) Whether dataplane access is private for this organization.
- `is_universal_api` (Boolean) Whether the organization uses universal API routing.
- `org_id` (String) The organization ID.
- `proxy_url` (String) The proxy URL used by this organization.
- `realtime_url` (String) The realtime websocket URL used by this organization.
